member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties
member.summary: Provides access to the properties bag of any office document (i.e. Word, Excel etc.)

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.#ctor(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage)
member.summary: Provides access to all the office document properties.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.GetCorePropertyValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of a core property Private method, for internal use only!
member.param: The namespace of the property
The property name
member.returns: The current value of the property

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.SetCorePropertyValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a core property value. Private method, for internal use only!
member.param: The property's namespace
The name of the property
The value of the property

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.GetCustomPropertyValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of a custom property
member.param: The name of the property
member.returns: The current value of the property

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.SetCustomPropertyValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to set the value of a current custom property or create your own custom property. Currently only supports string values.
member.param: The name of the property
The value of the property

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.Save
member.summary: Saves the office document properties back to the package (if they exist!).

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.CorePropertiesUri
member.summary: The URI to the core properties component (core.xml)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.ExtendedPropertiesUri
member.summary: The URI to the extended properties component (app.xml)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.CustomPropertiesUri
member.summary: The URI to the custom properties component (custom.xml)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.CorePropertiesXml
member.summary: Provides access to the XML document that holds all the code document properties.

member.summary: Gets/sets the title property of the document (core property)

member.summary: Gets/sets the subject property of the document (core property)

member.summary: Gets/sets the author property of the document (core property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.Comments
member.summary: Gets/sets the comments property of the document (core property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.Keywords
member.summary: Gets/sets the keywords property of the document (core property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.LastModifiedBy
member.summary: Gets/sets the lastModifiedBy property of the document (core property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.LastPrinted
member.summary: Gets/sets the lastPrinted property of the document (core property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.Category
member.summary: Gets/sets the category property of the document (core property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.Status
member.summary: Gets/sets the status property of the document (core property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.ExtendedPropertiesXml
member.summary: Provides access to the XML document that holds the extended properties of the document (app.xml)

member.summary: Gets the Application property of the document (extended property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.HyperlinkBase
member.summary: Gets/sets the HyperlinkBase property of the document (extended property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.AppVersion
member.summary: Gets the AppVersion property of the document (extended property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.Company
member.summary: Gets/sets the Company property of the document (extended property)

member.summary: Gets/sets the Manager property of the document (extended property)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.OfficeProperties.CustomPropertiesXml
member.summary: Provides access to the XML document which holds the document's custom properties

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooterText
member.summary: Helper class for ExcelHeaderFooter - simply stores the three header or footer text strings.

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooterText.LeftAlignedText
member.summary: Sets the text to appear on the left hand side of the header (or footer) on the worksheet.

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooterText.CenteredText
member.summary: Sets the text to appear in the center of the header (or footer) on the worksheet.

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooterText.RightAlignedText
member.summary: Sets the text to appear on the right hand side of the header (or footer) on the worksheet.

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter
member.summary: Represents the Header and Footer on an Excel Worksheet

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.PageNumber
member.summary: Use this to insert the page number into the header or footer of the worksheet

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.NumberOfPages
member.summary: Use this to insert the number of pages into the header or footer of the worksheet

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.SheetName
member.summary: Use this to insert the name of the worksheet into the header or footer of the worksheet

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.FilePath
member.summary: Use this to insert the full path to the folder containing the workbook into the header or footer of the worksheet

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.FileName
member.summary: Use this to insert the name of the workbook file into the header or footer of the worksheet

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.CurrentDate
member.summary: Use this to insert the current date into the header or footer of the worksheet

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.CurrentTime
member.summary: Use this to insert the current time into the header or footer of the worksheet

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: ExcelHeaderFooter Constructor For internal use only!

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.Save
member.summary: Saves the header and footer information to the worksheet XML

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.GetHeaderFooterText(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooterText)
member.summary: Helper function for Save

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.AlignWithMargins
member.summary: Gets/sets the alignWithMargins attribute

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.differentOddEven
member.summary: Gets/sets the flag that tells Excel to display different headers and footers on odd and even pages.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.differentFirst
member.summary: Gets/sets the flag that tells Excel to display different headers and footers on the first page of the worksheet.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.oddHeader
member.summary: Provides access to a ExcelHeaderFooterText class that allows you to set the values of the header on odd numbered pages of the document. If you want the same header on both odd and even pages, then only set values in this ExcelHeaderFooterText class.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.oddFooter
member.summary: Provides access to a ExcelHeaderFooterText class that allows you to set the values of the footer on odd numbered pages of the document. If you want the same footer on both odd and even pages, then only set values in this ExcelHeaderFooterText class.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.evenHeader
member.summary: Provides access to a ExcelHeaderFooterText class that allows you to set the values of the header on even numbered pages of the document.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.evenFooter
member.summary: Provides access to a ExcelHeaderFooterText class that allows you to set the values of the footer on even numbered pages of the document.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.firstHeader
member.summary: Provides access to a ExcelHeaderFooterText class that allows you to set the values of the header on the first page of the document.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelHeaderFooter.firstFooter
member.summary: Provides access to a ExcelHeaderFooterText class that allows you to set the values of the footer on the first page of the document.

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell
member.summary: ExcelCell represents an individual worksheet cell.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.#ctor(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of ExcelCell class. For internal use only!
member.param: A reference to the parent worksheet
The row number in the parent worksheet
The column number in the parent worksheet

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.RemoveValue
member.summary: Removes the XmlNode that holds the cell's value. Useful when the cell contains a formula as this will force Excel to re-calculate the cell's content.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.ToString
member.summary: Returns the cell's value as a string.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.IsNumericValue(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the string contains a numeric value

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.AddFormulaElement
member.summary: Adds a new formula node to the cell in the correct location

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.GetColumnLetter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the character representation of the numbered column
member.param: The number of the column

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.GetColumnNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the column number from the cellAddress e.g. D5 would return 5
member.param: An Excel format cell addresss (e.g. D5)

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.GetRowNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the row number from the cellAddress e.g. D5 would return 5
member.param: An Excel format cell addresss (e.g. D5)

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.GetCellAddress(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the AlphaNumeric representation that Excel expects for a Cell Address
member.param: The number of the row
The number of the column in the worksheet
member.returns: The cell address in the format A1

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.IsValidCellAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Checks that a cell address (e.g. A5) is valid.
member.param: The alphanumeric cell address
member.returns: True if the cell address is valid

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.UpdateFormulaReferences(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the Excel formula so that all the cellAddresses are incremented by the row and column increments if they fall after the afterRow and afterColumn. Supports inserting rows and columns into existing templates.
member.param: The Excel formula
The amount to increment the cell reference by
The amount to increment the cell reference by
Only change rows after this row
Only change columns after this column

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.Element
member.summary: Read-only reference to the cell's XmlNode (for internal use only)

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.Row
member.summary: Read-only reference to the cell's row number

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.Column
member.summary: Read-only reference to the cell's column number

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.CellAddress
member.summary: Returns the current cell address in the standard Excel format (e.g. 'E5')

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.IsNumeric
member.summary: Returns true if the cell's contents are numeric.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.Value
member.summary: Gets/sets the value of the cell.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.DataType
member.summary: Gets/sets the cell's data type. Not currently implemented correctly!

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.Style
member.summary: Allows you to set the cell's style using a named style

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.StyleID
member.summary: Allows you to set the cell's style using the number of the style. Useful when coping styles from one cell to another.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.Hyperlink
member.summary: Allows you to set/get the cell's Hyperlink

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.Formula
member.summary: Provides read/write access to the cell's formula.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell.Comment
member.summary: Returns the comment as a string

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelRow
member.summary: Represents an individual row in the spreadsheet.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelRow.#ctor(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the ExcelRow class. For internal use only!
member.param: The parent worksheet
The row number

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelRow.Node
member.summary: Provides access to the node representing the row. For internal use only!

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelRow.Hidden
member.summary: Allows the row to be hidden in the worksheet

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelRow.Height
member.summary: Sets the height of the row

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelRow.Style
member.summary: Gets/sets the style name based on the StyleID

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelRow.StyleID
member.summary: Sets the style for the entire row using the style ID.

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage
member.summary: Represents an Excel 2007 XLSX file package. Opens the file and provides access to all the components (workbook, worksheets, properties etc.).

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.schemaMain
member.summary: Provides access to the main schema used by all Excel components

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.schemaRelationships
member.summary: Provides access to the relationship schema

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.#ctor(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the ExcelPackage class based on a existing file or creates a new file.
member.param: If newFile exists, it is opened. Otherwise it is created from scratch.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.#ctor(System.IO.FileInfo,System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the ExcelPackage class based on a existing template. WARNING: If newFile exists, it is deleted!
member.param: The name of the Excel file to be created
The name of the Excel template to use as the basis of the new Excel file

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.DebugMode
member.summary: Setting DebugMode to true will cause the Save method to write the raw XML components to the same folder as the output Excel file

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.WriteDebugFile(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a debug file to the output folder, but only if DebugMode = true
member.param: The XmlDocument to save to the file system
The subfolder in which the file is to be saved
The name of the file to save.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.GetSharedUri(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Obtains the Uri to a shared part (e.g. sharedstrings.xml)
member.param: Uri to the parent component
The relationship to the parent component
member.returns: The Uri to a shared part

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.AddSchemaAttribute(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds additional schema attributes to the root element
member.param: The root element
The namespace of the schema
The schema to apply

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.AddSchemaAttribute(System.Xml.XmlElement,System.String)
member.summary: Adds additional schema attributes to the root element
member.param: The root element
The schema to apply

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.SavePart(System.Uri,System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Saves the XmlDocument into the package at the specified Uri.
member.param: The Uri of the component
The XmlDocument to save

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.Dispose
member.summary: Closes the package.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.GetXmlFromUri(System.Uri)
member.summary: Obtains the XmlDocument from the package referenced by the Uri
member.param: The Uri to the component

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.Package
member.summary: Returns a reference to the file package

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage.Workbook
member.summary: Returns a reference to the workbook component within the package. All worksheets and cells can be accessed through the workbook.

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCalcMode
member.summary: Represents the possible workbook calculation modes

member.summary: Set the calculation mode to Automatic

member.summary: Set the calculation mode to AutomaticNoTable

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCalcMode.Manual
member.summary: Set the calculation mode to Manual

member.summary: Represents the Excel workbook and provides access to all the document properties and worksheets within the workbook.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the ExcelWorkbook class. For internal use only!

member.summary: Saves the workbook and all its components to the package. For internal use only!

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorkbook.Worksheets
member.summary: Provides access to all the worksheets in the workbook.

member.summary: The Uri to the shared strings file

member.summary: Provides access to the XML data representing the workbook in the package.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorkbook.SharedStringsXml
member.summary: Provides access to the XML data representing the shared strings in the package. For internal use only!

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorkbook.StylesXml

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorkbook.Properties
member.summary: Provides access to the office document properties

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorkbook.CalcMode
member.summary: Allows you to set the calculation mode for the workbook.

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets
member.summary: Provides enumeration through all the worksheets in the workbook

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets.#ctor(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the ExcelWorksheets class. For internal use only!

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that allows the foreach syntax to be used to itterate through all the worksheets

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a blank worksheet with the desired name

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets.CreateNewWorksheet
member.summary: Creates the XML document representing a new empty worksheet

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a worksheet from the workbook package
member.param: The position of the worksheet in the workbook

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets.Copy(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies the named worksheet and creates a new worksheet in the same workbook
member.param: The name of the existing worksheet
The name of the new worksheet to create

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of worksheets in the workbook

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the worksheet at the specified position.
member.param: The position of the worksheet. 1-base

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheets.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the worksheet matching the specified name
member.param: The name of the worksheet

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheetView
member.summary: Represents the different view states of the worksheet

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheetView.#ctor(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet)
member.summary: Creates a new ExcelWorksheetView which provides access to all the view states of the worksheet.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheetView.SheetViewElement
member.summary: Returns a reference to the sheetView element

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheetView.TabSelected
member.summary: Indicates if the worksheet is selected within the workbook

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheetView.PageLayoutView
member.summary: Sets the view mode of the worksheet to pageLayout

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn
member.summary: Represents an individual column within the worksheet

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn.#ctor(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the ExcelColumn class. For internal use only!

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn.ToString
member.summary: Returns the range of columns covered by the column definition.
member.returns: A string describing the range of columns covered by the column definition.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn.Element
member.summary: Returns a reference to the Element that represents the column. For internal use only!

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn.ColumnMin
member.summary: Sets the first column the definition refers to.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn.ColumnMax
member.summary: Sets the last column the definition refers to.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn.Hidden
member.summary: Allows the column to be hidden in the worksheet

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn.Width
member.summary: Sets the width of the column in the worksheet

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn.Style
member.summary: Sets the style for the entire column using a style name.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelColumn.StyleID
member.summary: Sets the style for the entire column using the style ID.

member.name: T:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet
member.summary: Represents an Excel worksheet and provides access to its properties and methods

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.tempColumnNumberTag
member.summary: Temporary tag for all column numbers in the worksheet XML For internal use only!

member.name: F:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.xlPackage
member.summary: Reference to the parent package For internal use only!

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.#ctor(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelPackage,System.String,System.String,System.Uri,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of ExcelWorksheet class. For internal use only!
member.param: Parent ExcelPackage object
Package relationship ID
Name of the new worksheet
Uri of the worksheet in the package
The worksheet's ID in the workbook XML
Indicates if the worksheet is hidden

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.Cell(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Provides access to an individual cell within the worksheet.
member.param: The row number in the worksheet
The column number in the worksheet

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.Row(System.Int32)
member.summary: Provides access to an individual row within the worksheet so you can set its properties.
member.param: The row number in the worksheet

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.Column(System.Int32)
member.summary: Provides access to an individual column within the worksheet so you can set its properties.
member.param: The column number in the worksheet

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.CreateSharedFormula(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell,OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell)
member.summary: Creates a shared formula based on the formula already in startCell Essentially this supports the formula attributes such as t="shared" ref="B2:B4" si="0" as per Brian Jones: Open XML Formats blog. See http://blogs.msdn.com/brian_jones/archive/2006/11/15/simple-spreadsheetml-file-part-2-of-3.aspx
member.param: The cell containing the formula
The end cell (i.e. end of the range)

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.CreateConditionalFormatting(OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell,OfficeOpenXml.ExcelCell,System.String)
member.summary: Inserts conditional formatting for the cell range. Currently only supports the dataBar style.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.InsertRow(System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts a new row into the spreadsheet. Existing rows below the insersion position are shifted down. All formula are updated to take account of the new row.
member.param: The position of the new row

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.DeleteRow(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deletes the specified row from the worksheet. If shiftOtherRowsUp=true then all formula are updated to take account of the deleted row.
member.param: The number of the row to be deleted
Set to true if you want the other rows renumbered so they all move up

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.Save
member.summary: Saves the worksheet to the package. For internal use only.

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.AddNumericCellIDs
member.summary: Adds numeric cell identifiers so that it is easier to work out position of cells Private method, for internal use only!

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.ReplaceNumericCellIDs
member.summary: Replaces the numeric cell identifiers we inserted with AddNumericCellIDs with the traditional A1, A2 cell identifiers that Excel understands. Private method, for internal use only!

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.GetStyleName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the name of the style using its xfId
member.param: The xfId of the style

member.name: M:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.GetStyleID(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the style ID given a style name. The style ID will be created if not found, but only if the style name exists!

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.WorksheetUri
member.summary: Read-only: the Uri to the worksheet within the package

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.Part
member.summary: Read-only: a reference to the PackagePart for the worksheet within the package

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.RelationshipID
member.summary: Read-only: the ID for the worksheet's relationship with the workbook in the package

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.SheetID
member.summary: The unique identifier for the worksheet. Note that these can be random, so not too useful in code!

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.NameSpaceManager
member.summary: Provides access to a namespace manager instance to allow XPath searching

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.View
member.summary: Returns a ExcelWorksheetView object that allows you to set the view state properties of the worksheet

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.Name
member.summary: The worksheet's name as it appears on the tab

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.Hidden
member.summary: Indicates if the worksheet is hidden in the workbook

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.defaultRowHeight
member.summary: Allows you to get/set the default height of all rows in the worksheet

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.WorksheetXml
member.summary: The XML document holding all the worksheet data.

member.name: P:OfficeOpenXml.ExcelWorksheet.HeaderFooter
member.summary: A reference to the header and footer class which allows you to set the header and footer for all odd, even and first pages of the worksheet
